SELECT sum(f.c) as postNum,sum(f.d) as commentNum,sum(f.f) as evaNum, f.member_id as memberId , sum(f.comment_num) as post_comment_num , sum(f.like_num) as post_like_num FROM ( ( SELECT COUNT(*) as c , 0 as d , 0 as f, cp.member_id , cp.comment_num , cp.like_num FROM t_cmm_post cp WHERE cp.id in ( SELECT cm1.post_id FROM t_cmm_post_circle cm1 WHERE cm1.circle_id = #{circleId} ) and cp.state = 1 GROUP BY cp.member_id ) UNION ALL ( SELECT 0 as c , COUNT(*) as d,0 as f, cc.member_id , 0 as comment_num, 0 as like_num FROM t_cmm_comment cc WHERE cc.post_id in ( SELECT cm2.post_id FROM t_cmm_post_circle cm2 WHERE cm2.circle_id = #{circleId} ) and cc.state = 0 GROUP BY cc.member_id )
) f GROUP BY f.member_id ORDER BY SUM(f.c+f.d+f.f+f.comment_num+f.like_num) DESC,f.member_id DESC
